title: Carbon is contained in all organic compounds 2

content.question: For THREE of the following, predict and explain the effect on the carbon cycle if: decomposers were absent deforestation occurred volcanic dust accumulated in the atmosphere the average ocean temperature increased

frqParts.text: For THREE of the following, predict and explain the effect on the carbon cycle if: decomposers were absent deforestation occurred volcanic dust accumulated in the atmosphere the average ocean temperature increased

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
